Welcome to Ms.Dobry's Class

My Favorite Things of Russian Culture!

More Things to Know About Me:

Hello all! I am Ms.Dobry. Ocassionally I like to crack some jokes from time to time, and see if my students are breakable or not. And then I can say, "I am Jokes!" In my class, the natives are called the Cheburashkas. They are my mininons, I train them very well, so they can venture in the world and do stuff. But the orignial Cheburashka is my honey-boo-boo. Im CEO of all things Russia, and I'm very organized and productive- I kill all birds in every class. I'm excited to be your teacher.
